name: fists
message: You named both of them cents
You wish you had something better
Time to give them a knuckle sandwich

name: axe
message: You bring down your axe with great force
You perform a twirl before going in with a slash
You throw your axe... You quickly retrieve it after

name: machete
message: The machete feels quite good in your hands
You make quick slashes with your machete
You make a quick jab with your machete

name: sword
message: While you studied 201 I studied the blade
You slash with great might using your sword
You make a skillful lung at your foe

name: shield
message: You raise your shield in defence
You block a mighty blow with your shield
You are thankful that the shield took the hit instead of you

name: amulet
message: You feel the defensive magic of your amulet
The power around your neck protects you
You feel a protective aura originating around your neck

name: cape
message: The cape flaps uselessly around you
You feel cool with the useless cape flapping behind you
Your cape almost got caught on something, you feel this cape is almost a detriment

name: mithril armor
message: Nothing like sold metal between you and an enemy
Whoa! that one would of put a hole through your chest! Good thing you have armor
You wonder what would of happened if you weren't wearing armor
